title: How do I Configure my Practice Profile?
body:
How do I configure my Practice Profile?

There are four separate sections that can be configured within a practice's profile.
Biography

The Biography section is for connecting your practice to the Medirecords Community and recording the practice's Keywords and Biography.

To Join the Medirecords Community, click the Join the Medirecords Community tick-box.

To Add Keywords, click the field and type in your sub-specialty and any other keywords to help patients identify you. 

To Add a Biography, click the field and type in a biography about the clinic.

Click Save to apply the changes.

Details
 The Details section contains important information about the Practices Profile, most of which can be edited or updated within this section.

To update or edit details about the practice, Click on the Field that you want to edit, and then click Save to apply the changes.




Identifiers

The Identifiers section is used for recording the practice's unique Healthcare Identifiers.

To Update Practice Identifiers, click the Name of the Field, and type in the number. Click Save to apply the changes.



Rooms

The Rooms section is for adding consulting rooms to your clinic.

To Add a Room, click the + symbol



Type in the Name of the Room, and press Enter.



Click Save to apply the changes.
